hero.title: Bold cuts that turn heads
hero.subtitle: We're not your average salon. At EDGE, we specialize in fashion-forward cuts, vibrant color, and styles that make a statement. Expect the unexpected and leave with confidence.
hero.imageAlt: Modern industrial hair studio with exposed brick

about.title: The EDGE Difference
about.subtitle: Where creativity meets technique
about.content: Founded by creative director Jamie Park in 2018, EDGE is downtown's go-to studio for clients who aren't afraid to push boundaries. We stay ahead of trends, master the latest techniques, and believe your hair is your ultimate accessory.

products.name: Signature Cut
products.description: Precision cutting with our trained stylists. Includes wash, cut, style, and finishing products.

products.name: Creative Color
products.description: Vivid fashion colors, pastels, or natural tones. We're color specialists. Includes toner and blow dry.

products.name: Balayage
products.description: Hand-painted highlights for that lived-in, sun-kissed look. Includes treatment and style.

products.name: Keratin Treatment
products.description: Smooth, frizz-free hair for months. Professional formula with style included.

products.name: Tape Extensions
products.description: Natural-looking length and volume with premium tape-in extensions. Consultation included.

products.name: Special Event Styling
products.description: Updos, braids, or editorial styling for your event. Includes trial consultation.

items.text: Jamie gave me the pixie cut I've been dreaming about! I feel so confident and get compliments daily. 10/10 would recommend!

items.title: Regular Client

items.text: I went from boring brown to rose gold balayage and I'm OBSESSED. These artists really know color.

items.title: Color Client

items.text: Best hair extensions experience ever. They look so natural and the application was meticulous. Worth every penny!

members.title: Creative Director & Founder
members.bio: 10+ years pushing creative boundaries in hair. Trained in NYC, featured in editorial shoots, and obsessed with making clients feel amazing.
